TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ParseChildrenAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ParseChildrenAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ParseChildrenAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定義您可以在開發 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項時使用的中繼資料 (Metadata) 屬性 (Attribute)。

span.span: Defines a metadata attribute that you can use when developing ASP.NET server controls.

summary.span: 請使用 類別，指出頁面剖析器對於頁面上宣告之伺服器控制項標記內巢狀內容的處理方式。

span.span: Use the class to indicate how the page parser should treat content nested inside a server control tag declared on a page.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您將使用伺服器控制項標記來指定自訂伺服器控制項的剖析邏輯中繼資料屬性。The class allows you to specify parsing logic for a custom server control by marking the server control with the metadata attribute. 標示您的伺服器控制項的中繼資料屬性與`ParseChildren(true)`可指示剖析器解譯為屬性的伺服器控制項的標記內所包含的項目。Marking your server control with the metadata attribute `ParseChildren(true)` instructs the parser to interpret the elements that are contained within the server control's tags as properties. 在此案例中，屬性是`true`。In this scenario, the property is `true`. 將中繼資料屬性與您伺服器控制項標記`ParseChildren(true,"")`設定會傳遞至屬性的屬性名稱的屬性。Marking your server control with the metadata attribute `ParseChildren(true,"")` sets the property to the name of the property that is passed into the attribute. 將中繼資料屬性與您伺服器控制項標記`ParseChildren(false)`，預設值，可指示剖析器解譯為將剖析的內容伺服器控制項的標記內所包含的項目以及相關聯也就是為控制項。Marking your server control with the metadata attribute `ParseChildren(false)`, the default value, instructs the parser to interpret the elements that are contained within the server control's tags as content that will be parsed with an associated that is, as controls. 在此案例中，屬性是`false`。In this scenario, the property is `false`. 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 在本節中的程式碼範例包含兩個部分。The code example in this section contains two parts. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性類別。The first code example demonstrates how to set properties for the class. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁中的類別。The second code example demonstrates how to use classes in an ASP.NET page. 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定物件的自訂伺服器控制項，名為`CollectionPropertyControl`。The following code example demonstrates how to set the object of a custom server control named `CollectionPropertyControl`. 設定屬性設`true`並屬性設`Employee`類別。The sets the property to `true` and the property to the `Employee` class. [!code-csharp[ParseChildrenAttribute_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_1/CS/parsechildren.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ParseChildrenAttribute_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_1/VB/parsechildren.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`CollectionPropertyControl`和`Employee`ASP.NET 網頁中的類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes in an ASP.NET page. 執行個體`Employee`類別會以宣告方式新增。Instances of the `Employee` class are added declaratively. [!code-aspx-csharp[ParseChildrenAttribute_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_1/CS/parsechildren.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[ParseChildrenAttribute_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_1/VB/parsechildren.aspx#3)]

summary.span: 使用 屬性，初始化 類別的新執行個體，以判斷伺服器控制項中所包含的項目是否剖析成伺服器控制項的屬性。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the property to determine if the elements that are contained within a server control are parsed as properties of the server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`childrenAsProperties`是`false`，伺服器控制項中所包含的項目是否剖析成控制項。If `childrenAsProperties` is `false`, the elements that are contained within the server control are parsed as a control. `false` 是的預設值。`false` is the default for . ## Examples 在本節中的程式碼範例包含兩個部分。The code example in this section contains two parts. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性類別。The first code example demonstrates how to set properties for the class. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁中的類別。The second code example demonstrates how to use classes in an ASP.NET page. 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定物件的自訂伺服器控制項，名為`CollectionPropertyControl`。The following code example demonstrates how to set the object for a custom server control named `CollectionPropertyControl`. 當類別定義之前宣告`CollectionPropertyControl`，則設定屬性設`true`。When the is declared before the class defining `CollectionPropertyControl`, the sets the property to `true`. [!code-csharp[ParseChildrenAttribute_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_2/CS/parsechildren.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ParseChildrenAttribute_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_2/VB/parsechildren.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`CollectionPropertyControl`和`Employee`ASP.NET 網頁中的類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes in an ASP.NET page. 一個執行個體`Employee`類別會以宣告方式加入，並以程式設計方式新增另一個。One instance of the `Employee` class is added declaratively and another is added programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[ParseChildrenAttribute_2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_2/CS/parsechildren.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[ParseChildrenAttribute_2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_2/VB/parsechildren.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允許的控制項型別是否`null`，它不被指定的意義、 預設類型，這是控制，就會傳回。If the allowed control type is `null`, meaning that it has not been specified, the default type, which is a control, is returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何查詢屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to query the property. 如需定義`CollectionPropertyControl`並`Employee`類別，可在此範例中，請參閱。For definitions of the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes that are used in this code example, see . summary.span: 定義 類別的預設值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值欄位是`false`，這表示項目不會剖析成伺服器控制項的屬性。The default value for the field is `false`, which means that elements are not parsed as properties of the server control.

span.span: The name of the default collection property of the server control into which the elements are parsed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute ParseAsChildren
Public Shared ReadOnly ParseAsChildren As ParseChildrenAttribute

summary.span: 表示伺服器控制項中所包含的巢狀內容剖析成控制項。

span.span: Indicates that the nested content that is contained within the server control is parsed as controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果呼叫欄位時，伺服器控制項中所包含的巢狀的內容不會剖析成屬性; 相反地，它們會被剖析為控制項。If the field is called, the nested content that are contained within the server control are not parsed as properties; rather, they are parsed as a control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute ParseAsProperties
Public Shared ReadOnly ParseAsProperties As ParseChildrenAttribute

summary.span: 表示伺服器控制項中所包含的巢狀內容剖析成控制項的屬性。

span.span: Indicates that the nested content that is contained within a server control is parsed as properties of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果欄位稱為、 伺服器控制項中所包含的巢狀的內容剖析成屬性。If the field is called, the nested content contained within a server control is parsed as properties.
